clinical_study.brief_title: Multivariate Analysis of Serum High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein in Patients With Acute Phase Stroke
clinical_study.official_title: Multivariate Analysis of Serum High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein in Patients With Acute Phase Stroke

lead_sponsor.agency: Hospital Central Sur de Alta Especialidad

clinical_study.source: Hospital Central Sur de Alta Especialidad

brief_summary.textblock: Stroke is one of main causes of death and impairment worldwide. Objective of this study is to analyze serum High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein in acute phase stroke in patients attended at Petróleos Mexicanos Hospital Central Sur de Alta Especialidad and to correlate with stroke extension and clinical features.

primary_outcome.measure: Measure of serum High sensitivity C-Reactive Protein level
primary_outcome.time_frame: within the first 8 hours since admission to hospital
primary_outcome.description: Serum levels of serum High sensitivity C-Reactive Protein will be measured in patients with suspicion of stroke at the emergency room within the first 8 hours of arrival at our hospital

secondary_outcome.measure: National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale
secondary_outcome.time_frame: within the first 4 hours since admission to emergency room
secondary_outcome.description: clinical impact of stroke will be determined by neurology and neurosurgery department at admission to emergency room of our hospital

other_outcome.time_frame: within the first 4 hours since admission to emergency room
other_outcome.description: brain image will be taken as soon as possible when patient suspected with stroke arrives to emergency room and after clinical evaluation

other_outcome.time_frame: origin will be diagnosed during the hospital stay expecting no more than 1 week
other_outcome.description: origin of stroke will be investigated within hospital stay

other_outcome.time_frame: hospital stay is expected for no more than 1 week unless intensive care unit is needed
other_outcome.description: from arrival of patient to emergency room until discharge

clinical_study.condition: National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale

arm_group.description: Patients admitted to hospital who are diagnosed with stroke will be treated as usually a our center by observation, venous or arterial thrombolysis depending on extension, condition, thrombolysis feasibility.

study_pop.textblock: Patients affiliated to Petróleos Mexicanos medical system of any gender between 18 and 80 years old suspected of acute phase stroke who arrive to emergency room at our hospital

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients suspected of acute phase stroke who arrive to emergency room at our hospital
- Patients affiliated to Petróleos Mexicanos medical system
- Patients of any gender
- Patients between 18 and 80 years old
Exclusion Criteria:
- Stroke provoked by angiographic procedure
- Pregnancy
- Patient under chemotherapy or radiotherapy
- Recently surgery or trauma among last 30 days
- Heparin usage
- Stroke and/ or thrombolysis history
- Active infection
- Liver disease
